DOC.brief_summary: Study objective evaluate level control hypercholesterolemia Egypt patient take lipid lower agent least 3 month ( drug change dose amendment minimum 6 week ) .
DOC.brief_title: Centralized Pan-Middle East Survey Undertreatment Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.detailed_description: Centralized Pan-Middle East Survey Undertreatment Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: 18 year current lipid lower drug least 3 month dose change minimum 6 week Subject must provide informed consent comply survey procedures Less 18 year less 3 month antidyslipidemic agent Subjects unwilling unable provide inform consent
